If my actions are moding, Logo, please say so and this post is void. 
I'm assuming Spears fainted.

::Firearm::

Firearm frowns, driving up to Spears and transforming into robot
mode. 
He picks her up, slinging her over his shoulder. Taking out a small 
device from a compartment, he attatches it to her neck. The thing 
buzzez as it sends out an electric current, designed to put her into 
stasis.

"I'll take her to the Cybertronian Fire," he says to Lunarpine,
"We'll 
see if we can fix her there."

He activates his jetpack, flying off.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> Looks at Firearm, her maximal program in control, she sees him fire 
> at her. She waves her hands infont of her. "NO! DON"T SHOOT! PLEASE 
> DON'T..." the shots hit her in the chest and head, sending her 
flying 
> back a few yards.  Her body landed with a thud on the ground.  
> 
> Her trainer program and maximal program were starting to fight head 
> to head again. Her circuits started to smolder and she groaned as 
she 
> lay there.   A small ribbon of smoke escaped from her neck panel
and 
> head gear. She slowly opened her optics, turning head slightly she 
> looked up at the sky.  "What is going on?" she whispered as she 
> slipped into the blackness.  Her optics flickered as her programs 
> went
